## Slide with Table

```{r cars, echo = TRUE}
mtcars |>
  slice(1:5) |>  
  omni_table()
```

## Slide with Plot

```{r pressure}
iris |> 
  group_by(Species) |> 
  summarise(sepal_length_mean = mean(Sepal.Length)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Species, y = sepal_length_mean, fill = Species)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_fill_omni_discrete() +
  theme_omni()
```
